# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position (x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position (x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump at position (x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler at position (x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine at position (x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group at position (x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group at position (x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group at position (x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt at position (x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt at position (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burner inserters have a sufficient fuel supply before use.
- Regularly check the status of entities to prevent them from running out of fuel.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the electric network to generate power.
- Check the status of the electricity group to ensure it is plugged into the electric network.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that the burner inserter has a source of items to insert.
- Check the status of the burner inserter to ensure it is not waiting for source items.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the necessary ingredients to operate.
- Check the status of the stone furnace to ensure it has the required ingredients.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the provided logs.
No important variables have been assigned in the provided logs.
